title: Enjoy Christmas shopping Mandarin Oriental, Paris
text:
Enjoy Christmas shopping with Mandarin Oriental, Paris Published on : Thursday, September 24, 2015
Mandarin Oriental, Paris is offering a luxury Christmas shopping experience from November. Guests booking the Festive Season Package will enjoy luxury accommodation at the hotel and VIP access to the city’s prestigious department store, Printemps Haussmann.
The world’s leading department store for Fashion, Luxury and Beauty since 1865, Printemps offers tailor-made services for shoppers, including personalised welcome, local delivery and international shipping. To make the shopping experience feel even more special, a multilingual personal shopper team (Lifestyle & Fashion experts) welcomes each guest in a private lounge (by appointment only).
Families and adults who love Christmas decorations will take delight in the spectacular festive displays that will adorn the façades and windows of Printemps. To celebrate its 150th anniversary, the entire store will be transformed into a “total show” full of poetry, magic and fantasy to create a truly exceptional Christmas. Inspired by a fairy tale written in its honor in 1911, Printemps will bring back its eponymous Fairy to make everyone’s dearest wish come true: to put spring into Christmas!
To help them complete their shopping spree at Printemps and on the fashionable Rue Saint-Honoré, guests can enjoy a delicious hot take-away drink from the Mandarin Cake Shop.
The Festive Season Package includes:
· Luxurious accommodation for minimum two nights stay at Mandarin Oriental, Paris
· A daily dining or spa credit of EUR 100 or EUR 200 for a suite booking
· Printemps Haussmann tailor-made services, which include:
o Personalised welcome
o Printemps VIP card with special offer
o Multilingual personal shopper team
o Hands-free shopping – store looks after guest’s shopping until they leave
o Priority tax refund
o Local delivery and international shipping with each item wrapped in Printemps Christmas gift wrap (upon request)
· Surprise Christmas gift from Printemps
· Two hot drinks to take-away from the Mandarin Cake Shop
